description: {"blocks":[{"key":"aicn6","text":"scCU\u0026Tag on 10x platform uses scCUT\u0026Tag protocol from Steven Henikoff's lab (Kaya-Okur et al., 2019), and scATAC-seq chromium platform (10x Genomics) to perform single-cell barcoding. The method can be used to obtain high quality data for tens of thousands of single cells with high specificity. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ffag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3lsd","text":"See also accompanying BiorXiv preprint https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.09.02.279703v1 for more details. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":59}],"data":{}},{"key":"3nr5q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0rjt","text":"scCUT\u0026Tag can be performed on cell lines or freshly isolated cells from primary tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jfh6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4as4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"84C9CC67355211EBB3A90A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.09.02.279703v1"}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fio31","text":"Dissociate your tissue/ cell line into a single-cell (single-nuclei) suspension and count your cells using manual counting chamber. We generally use between 150,000-250,000 cells as input from fresh samples and up to 500,000 nuclei extracted from frozen tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gn27","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3dj87","text":"If FACS sorting from a dissociated tissue, sort directly into eppendorf tubes with 500 ul of the antibody buffer cooled to 4 degrees. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e835","text":"Centrifuge cells/nuclei for 5 minutes at 300x g. Resuspend in 200 ul of Antibody buffer and centrifuge again 3 minutes at 600x g. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qae6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"q7ut","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"boats","text":"Perform all incubations and centrifugations in 0.5ml standard eppendorf tubes. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"150p","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1bgp1","text":"Use swinging bucket rotor centrifuge with adapters for 0.5ml tubes. Centrifugation in fixed angle rotor centrifuge leads to higher nuclei loss during centrifugation. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qm4s","text":"Prepare 1:50 dilution of primary antibody in 200 ul of antibody buffer per sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br4ia","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2o1nq","text":"Resuspend the pelleted nuclei in 100 ul of the antibody buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31enj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8kq84","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a96m0","text":"We have validated following antibodies work for scCUT\u0026Tag:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"31hv4","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c6c7a","text":"H3K4me3 (Diagenode, C15410030)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"90qbu","text":"H3K27ac (Abcam, Ab177178)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2aru1","text":"H3K27me3 (Cell Signalling, 9733T)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bud3v","text":"H3K36me3 (Abcam, Ab9050)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"935ge","text":"Rad21 (GeneTex, GTX106012)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4aago","text":"Olig2 (Novus Biologicals, NBP1-28667)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pn4l","text":"Incubate the cells with primary antibody overnight at 4 degrees on rotating wheel or roller with slow rotation speed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"di2ro","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fp6f0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"EC5EE340354111EB9FDB9138D6BAD1D1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2933t","text":"Centrifuge the nuclei, 3minutes at 600x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3v64q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"uahl","text":"Remove supernatant. Wash once with 200ul of Dig-wash buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5lhe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t485","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bgfe","text":"Centrifuge 3 minutes at 600x g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c16ks","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fiind","text":"Remove the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"el6d","text":"Prepare 200ul of 1:50  diluted secondary antibody per sample in Dig-Wash-BSA buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32vio","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99l8l","text":"Resuspend the nuclei in 200 ul of diluted secondary antibody.    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fq6al","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fjft","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4oddd","text":"We use guinea pig anti rabbit secondary antibody for rabbit primary.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"epv9k","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e5fj5","text":"Guinea pig anti-rabbit (Novus Biologicals, NBP1-72763)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96ml0","text":"Incubate 1 hour    rotating at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dm1f8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"EB2AC150354711EB9FDB9138D6BAD1D1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2sj21","text":"Centrifuge 3 minutes at 600x g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ba10i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br9kp","text":"Remove the supernatant. Resuspend in 200 ul of Dig-300-BSA wash. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eulml","text":"Repeat the wash-centrifugation 2 more times for total of 3 washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fkle9","text":"Prepare 200 ul of 1:100 diluted pA-Tn5 in Dig-300-BSA buffer per sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv6j9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9v2fd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"db1i9","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 200 ul of diluted pA-Tn5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avmhd","text":"Incubate for 1 hour    rotating at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bsk1o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"414E9AC0354811EB9FDB9138D6BAD1D1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jrdf","text":"Centrifuge 3 minutes at 300x g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahiu6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ek04g","text":"Remove the supernatant. Resuspend in 200 ul of Dig-300-BSA wash. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8nnfu","text":"Repeat the wash-centrifugation 2 more times for total of 3 washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vmga","text":"Resuspend the nuclei in 200ul of tagmentation buffer. Incubate 1hour   at 37 degres in water bath or thermomixer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2c2g3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eia2p","text":"Tap the tubes 3-4 times during the incubation to prevent nuclei sedimentation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fq8t9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ca8er","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"9BEA19A0354811EB9FDB9138D6BAD1D1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9o1fm","text":"The tagmentation buffer does not contain BSA, so excessive clumping of nuclei can occur, depending on the sample. If that is the case, 1% final BSA can be added to the tagmentation buffer. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90jpv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd6j5","text":"Prepare 1x Diluted nuclei buffer (DNB) supplemented with 2%BSA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49hg6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5500","text":"Prepare STOP buffer by mixing 200ul of Dig-300 buffer with 10 ul of 500mM EDTA per sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evi93","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be53e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"53h05","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bh4m","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9lb89","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3n4bg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh6a1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":110,"style":"sub"},{"length":1,"offset":223,"style":"sub"}],"key":"7s0hc","text":"The 10x scATAC kit provides 20x diluted nuclei buffer (DNB). We routinely prepare 2x DNB by mixing 900ul of dH2O + 100ul of 20xDNB and store at -20 degrees. Then on the day of experiment we mix 500ul of 2x DNB + 400ul of dH2O + 100ul of 20%BSA to prepare 1xDBB+2%BSA.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"an64q","text":"We have successfully used 1xPBS + 1%BSA instead of 1x DNB+2%BSA. We did not observe any difference in nuclei clumping or data quality.  ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"437hr","text":"Centrifuge for 3 minutes at 300x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gn9j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5f3t","text":"Wash the nuclei with 200 ul of 1xDNB+BSA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: qPCR cycle check of bulk library
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"qmve","text":"At this stage success of tagmentation can be checked by generating bulk library from part of the sample and performing qPCR. \n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4b95","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"evcj1","text":"Centrifuge the nuclei for 3 minutes at 300x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5if4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38fv2","text":"Resuspend the nuclei in 15-25ul of1xDNB+2%BSA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6so0n","text":"Count the nuclei using manual counting chamber. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6apq2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75v3f","text":"Use 2ul of Nuclei suspension + 8ul of trypan blue in 2 replicates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fve6h","text":"Calculate nuclei concentration and refer to the 10x scATAC-seq manual regarding concentration and volume required for chromium chip loading for desired yield. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71p7t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2m85","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c3h02","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dfi0s","text":"scCUT\u0026Tag is compatible with","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5jng7","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bmvj3","text":"Chromium Single Cell ATAC Reagent Kits (v1)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"17aea","text":"or ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7di89","text":"Chromium Next GEM Single Cell ATAC Reagent Kits (v1.1 )","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15meo","text":"While nuclei are in 200ul of DNB, take 10% (20 ul) in a new tube, add 73 ul of water, 5 ul of 10%SDS and 2ul of proteinase K. Mix well by pipetting up and down 5x. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5436t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhucr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m0g5","text":"Keep the remaining nuclei on ice for about 2 hours during optional cycle check. This does not influence efficiency of scCUT\u0026Tag. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32ie4","text":"Incubate for 30 minutes    at 50 degrees. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ck42t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"6E29FE70354A11EB9FDB9138D6BAD1D1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esc7v","text":"Purify the DNA using ZYMO DNA Clean an Concentrator-5 kit. Use 1:5 ratio of binding buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ecd3p","text":"Elute the DNA in 25 ul of elution buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8idl2","text":"Mix qPCR reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blkb8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5avvl","text":"Fw primer ATAC*           2ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7amg5","text":"Rev primer  ATAC*         2ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5753a","text":"water                                8.5 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qoqa","text":"10xSYBR                          2.5 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4sh6","text":"2x NEBnext MM             25 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7alo2","text":"eluted DNA template    10ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmiev","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"escqf","text":"total                             50 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14j4u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aguvj","text":"*Indexed primers described by Buenrostro, J.D. et al. Single-cell chromatin accessibility reveals principles of regulatory variation. Nature 523:486 (2015).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4781p","text":"Skip Step 1 in the scATAC-seq manual, start at Step 2 GEM Generation and barcoding   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gdm2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mtpq","text":"If using scATAC-seq kit v1.1, thaw ATAC buffer B","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":35,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eomvo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

v1:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r8ku","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tnqm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ie3l","text":"Nuclei suspension            15 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3erak","text":"Barcoding reagent            61.5 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chnbs","text":"Reducing agent B            1.5 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br7fh","text":"Barcoding Enzyme            2 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evml1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2e38","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dmga","text":"scATAC v1.1:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9na46","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d66ns","text":"Nuclei suspension            8 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r6sq","text":"ATAC buffer B                    7 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kipf","text":"Barcoding reagent B         56.5 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fe7v","text":"Reducing agent B            1.5 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c406l","text":"Barcoding Enzyme            2 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6v83","text":" v1.1 requires ATAC buffer B from Step 1 to be added to the master mix. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vcv3","text":"Load the 10x chromium chip according to manufacturers instructions in the 10x scATAC-seq kit in Step 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crs5m","text":"Run qPCR program: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52au4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bumv3","text":"1. 72C 5min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh1ue","text":"2. 98C 1min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3u3jv","text":"3. 98C 15s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hc8s","text":"4. 63C 10s (data collection)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an9pu","text":"5. GOTO 3 39x","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj35s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9sef","text":"Continue with the protocol exactly as in manufacturers instructions in the 10x scATAC-seq from Step 3 onwards","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45nk6","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9mjv2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"2CA07700355811EBAFF2B54446AFC009","height":778,"id":176097,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"buffers_v4.jpg","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/public/2dd1aa9dfd48ac7108616c4707b62a22ddd1e3647c095aff594e77a054eabf02/csnd8wpw.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fm9b8wpw.jpg","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fm9a8wpw.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9g9ac","text":"Add 200ul of STOP buffer and mix well by pipetting up and down several times. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l4i6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d1c3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5r7pb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"53b65","text":"Final 0.5 % final BSA, critical, otherwise the nuclei would clump during the centrifugation","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"felhb","text":"Dilute Tn5ME-A, Tn5ME-B and Tn5ME-rev oligos to 100uM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mde2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r4uh","text":"Mix in two separate PCR tubes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fefi","text":"1. 10ul Tn5ME-A + 10ul Tn5ME-rev","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8593s","text":"2. 10ul Tn5ME-B + 10ul Tn5ME-rev","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ge0k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtstj","text":"Denature on a thermocycler for 5 min at 95C, and cool down slowly on the thermocycler by ramping down by 0.1C/s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5vi9","text":"Mix Tn5 with the annealed oligonucleotides:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dnmo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c730u","text":"Tn5ME-A/Tn5ME-rev         2 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evg6u","text":"Tn5ME-B/Tn5ME-rev         2 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehr2q","text":"Glycerol                               21.56 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iij9","text":"2x Dialysis buffer               21.3 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"butmt","text":"Tn5 (3.5 mg/ml)                 3.14 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5e7rn","text":"total                                      50 ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d07j3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5buuv","text":"Mix gently with pipette and incubate for 1h at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8oenc","text":"Store enzyme at -80C long term. Keep working stock at -20C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38dd3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbcfg","text":"Test small batch of Tn5 and if the loading is successful, scale up the loading reaction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49be0","text":"Prepare 2x dialysis buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"581gc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7b7l","text":"100mM      HEPES-KOH pH7.2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59eas","text":"200 mM     NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pnl5","text":"0.2 mM      EDTA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cdfk","text":"2mM          DTT*","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kkae","text":"0.2%           Triton-X      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lo52","text":"20%            Glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"p278","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0l9v","text":"* DTT is toxic and should only be added to the stock solution immediately prior to use (e.g. 45 ul buffer + 5 ul DTT)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efur3","text":"Keep buffer at 4 C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akncu","text":"Typical successful experiment has CT value in \u003c 15 and can be easily distinguished from failed runs where CT \u003e 20. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jlmq","text":"For final PCR amplification, use standard chromium scATAC-seq kit amplification protocol, with 16-20 PCR cycles depending on the antibody.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
